pyyaml
chromadb

# E-book parsing for semantic memory library domain
pymupdf4llm>=0.12.0     # PDF to markdown, optimized for LLMs
ebooklib>=0.18          # EPUB parsing
beautifulsoup4>=4.12    # HTML parsing for EPUB content
mobi>=0.3.3             # MOBI unpacking/conversion
lxml>=4.9               # Fast XML/HTML parsing
